channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Prayer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Prayer

item.title: CVE-2024-3405|2024-05-15T06:00:02.337Z -- Unknown -- WP Prayer
item.description: The WP Prayer WordPress plugin through 2.0.9 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack

item.title: CVE-2024-3406|2024-05-15T06:00:02.589Z -- Unknown -- WP Prayer
item.description: The WP Prayer WordPress plugin through 2.0.9 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its email settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack

item.title: CVE-2024-3407|2024-05-15T06:00:03.079Z -- Unknown -- WP Prayer
item.description: The WP Prayer WordPress plugin through 2.0.9 does not have CSRF checks in some places, which could allow attackers to make logged in users perform unwanted actions via CSRF attacks
